extendedInfo.description: Pop Bubbles with your baby!When first played, your baby may not be able to accurately touch the moving bubbles with his/her hand.Play the game with your baby consistently for a few days or weeks, and you will be surprised at the mobile development of your baby's hands.This game must be played in the presence of a parent, and it is encouraged for you to guide your baby through the game at first. âWhen to play! âWhen your baby is cranky or will not stop crying, playing this application can hold your baby's attention. (The various sounds, animated animals, and vibration stimulate your baby's curiosity.) âThis application may show better results than rattles or dolls. âThis application is exceptionally handy for parents who spend ample time with their babies but cannot figure out how to fill that time usefully. This application may be too advanced for infants under 12 months old.â»Caution âPlaying the application for an excessive amount of time or leaving the children alone with the device is not encouraged.  âBe cautious of injury due to dropping the device. (Place the device on a flat surface or hold it in your hand.) âKeep the device distant from your eyes.  âBabies tend to unawarely press the "home" button on the device while playing. As this may lead to your baby altering settings on your device, please do not leave your baby alone with your device. Remove advertisements : http://goo.gl/rNZopChristmas version (free): http://goo.gl/AAR9jPlease leave your valuable feedback : http://goo.gl/Ecrw4Meet more of our "My Baby" series : http://goo.gl/6wmxBâ¥You are so good mom, dad. :)

reviews.title: Put it on airplane mode people
reviews.comment: App works great baby loves it and there are NO ads when u have ur phone/tablet on airplane made.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It seems totally inappropriate to have ads
reviews.comment: So they want to make some money for the free version, I understand that, but who are the ads targeting? The only person who\'s going to tap them is the baby the app is targeted at. If the app can\'t be provided for free, then don\'t provide it for free. Any money generated through these ads is entirely dishonest.  If it wasn\'t for the ads, this would be a good app.
reviews.author: Oliver Jeeves

reviews.title: Remove ads please.
reviews.comment: I don\'t have a baby, but my kitten loves it. But she always hits the ads or my home screen button. Please remove ads and make a way for the app to be exited by me only, not my kitten.
reviews.author: Emily Moro

reviews.title: Silly people
reviews.comment: If you read a little bit you will find if you spend a 1$ there is no adds. So why all the low stars is it cause no one reads descriptions. No ads here
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Entertaining but...
reviews.comment: Firstly, yes the ads are ridiculous. But furthermore why do the pig and duck have injuries? Does there HAVE to be a bloody nose? I\'m sorry but learning begins early and I don\'t want to raise a kid that is numb to violence. Your app isn\'t helping.
reviews.author: Nooshi Dieken

reviews.title: Great app, wish it didn\'t have constant ad banner!!!
reviews.comment: My 11 month old LOVES this app. I put it on both my phone and kindle so whenever we\'re out and about it will help entertain him when he gets  fussy... only thing is the constant ad banner that sticks out at the top.. if I have my phone on silent/vibrate, it makes it even more tempting to him to click on... if they could change the way the ads worked (like having to double click twice in a row to actually go to it or just SOME type of childproofing system) this app would be golden- easily a 5 star app!
reviews.author: Brittany Hernandez

reviews.title: Great For Little Kids
reviews.comment: My little cousins love it. The best for little kids
reviews.author: Vinh Tran

reviews.title: I am disgusted!
reviews.comment: The adverts are not age suitable! My 20 month old daughter managed to press the ad which popped up as a video for the film evil dead!! If you need ads that is fine but be sure they are suitable for little eyes!!
reviews.author: andrea shine

reviews.title: My 2 year old loves this games
reviews.comment: This game keeps my son entertained for quite awhile. I  recommend adding child lock to prevent from clicking onto apps!
reviews.author: Usagi Tsukino

reviews.comment: Son love it
reviews.author: Denica Williamson

reviews.title: Ads are at the top so it\'s easy
reviews.comment: This is cool for continuous play. My son likes it.
reviews.author: Lolita Seals

reviews.title: Rubbish
reviews.comment: Not good as dont want to pay and all my daughter wants to dois press the ads!!!!! DELETED! !!
reviews.author: adam knight

reviews.title: Inappropriate Ads
reviews.comment: Seriously? Dating Ads on a kids game? Uninstalled!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I agree with christen about the advertisement
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: My daughter is crazy about this game.
reviews.author: Jessie Gillespie

reviews.comment: My son LOVES it, but when he accidentally hits the ads and stops the game he cries, so only 3 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Dating app ad on a child toy?
reviews.comment: My baby has lots of fun playing with this app. However, I am apprehensive about the dating app ad on a childs toy. Very inappropriate to me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: My baby game bubbles pop
reviews.comment: Fantastic my 2 year old loves this game , keeps him still for half hour
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ads for a baby game?
reviews.comment: What where you thinking?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Fun
reviews.author: A Google User
